conclusion: Analyze the motion of Car A and Car B based on the given velocity-time graph.
Car A's graph shows two identical arcs.
Car A's velocity changes at a constant rate over time.
Car A's velocity increases over time, so its acceleration is positive.
Car B's graph shows a straight line.
Car B's velocity remains constant over time.
Car B's velocity is constant, so its acceleration is zero.
Car A's acceleration is positive and constant, so its direction of acceleration does not change over time.
Car A's direction of acceleration did not change within the time interval of 0 to 4 seconds.
